```{r}
#Using the c() function, create and store two new vectors, called vec_a and vec_b, where a⃗=(1,6) and b⃗=(2,4):
vec_a <- c(1,6)
vec_b <- c(2,4)
```

#checking vectors
```{r}
vec_a
vec_b
```

```{r}
vec_a + vec_b
```

```{r}
vec_b - vec_a
```

```{r}
4*(vec_a)
```
```{r}
vec_a * vec_b
```
